name: Truck Simulator 3D Offroad
description:
If you want to became a truck driver ?
If you are tired of parking games this game is for you. Be the King of Road in "Truck Simulator 3D".Become a truck driver in this exciting new truck simulation game. Completely realistic missions and Truck Simulator experience are waiting for you.
Drive truck through narrow and dangerous mountain roads, through bridges and offroad terrains.

FEATURES
- Realistic farm and mountains.
- Advanced physics
- Easy tractor driving and truck driving simulation controls.
- Multi direction camera controls
